channel.title: What's wrong here

item.title: What's wrong here
item.dc:creator: @Fiire Fiirë
item.description:
@Fiire wrote:

Remove the glow completely, I think honestly servers who have “fly, modglow, adminglow, ownerglow” commands just FAIL!

Read full topic

item.title: What's wrong here
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

ziplock:

I wanted to know whats wrong…

[quote="`Rich, post:5, topic:238218"][quote author=ziplock link=topic=314453.msg2500908#msg2500908 date=1224647027]

Your best choice is to remove every single glow you have as it’s worthless, not cool, and only causes lag.

eh, i don’t have any glow.

i just wanted to know whats wrong…it bothers me.
[/quote]

Just to answer your question…

public boolean ModGlow;

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("modglow") && playerRights == 1) { ModGlow = true; }

In your process method;

if (ModGlow) { gfxRich(gfxid); }

Now delete it.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: What's wrong here
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:8, topic:238218”][quote author=xx qwertyuiop xx link=topic=314453.msg2500917#msg2500917 date=1224647299]
Because it isn’t part of a method… it’s just a statement.
I don’t know where you put it, but it was meant to be put in process, which it really shouldn’t be.
[/quote]

i don’t put useless shit in process.[/quote]

Then what did you want this for?

item.title: What's wrong here
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

i need help with my modglow

note: i hand typed all the below so there might be little errors like forgot a “;” or something but you should get the basic idea.

Ok so i added this boolean

public boolean modglow = false;

added this method

if (modglow == true) {
    stillgfx(247,absX,absY);
}

and this command

        if (command.startsWith("modglow")) {
                 modglow = true;
}

now i compiled no errors (on the version i tried on) but when i type the command no gfx is displayed.

what am i doing wrong here.

Read full topic
